title: Apogee AE-8 Professional Full Range Speaker With Fly Bracket
item_description:
Apogee AE-8 Professional Full Range Speaker With Fly Bracket

  • Apogee AE-8 Professional Full Range Speaker 
  • Format: Bi-amped/Two-way/Electronically-coupled
  • Drivers: LF: 15" (381mm) HF: 2" (51mm)
  • Dispersion: H: 60° x V: 40°
  • Frequency Response (1m on axis): 48 Hz to 16 kHz ± 3 dB
  • Max. SPL (@1m): 127 dB cont./133 dB peak PTML (Peak Transient Mechanical Limit): 143 dB
  • Sensitivity (1W @ 1m): LF: 99 dB/100 Hz to 1 kHz HF: 104 dB/1 kHz to 20 kHz
  • Nominal Impedance: 8-ohm, each driver
  • Max. Power Handling (cont./peak): LF: 600 W cont./2400 W peak HF: 150 W cont./600 W peak
  • Dimensions: front: 19" (483mm) W by 30.8" (782mm) H rear: 11.5" (292mm) W by 30.8" (782mm) H depth: 17.3" (440mm)
  • Weight: 90 lb. (40.8 kg)
  • Custom Pan Tilt fly bracket with Mega clamp
  • Caster Board
